message: The "Doctrine\DBAL\Result::__construct()" method is considered internal The result can be only instantiated by {@see Connection} or {@see Statement}. It may change without further notice. You should not extend it from "Doctrine\DBAL\Result@anonymous".

The "Doctrine\DBAL\Connection::__construct()" method is considered internal The connection can be only instantiated by the driver manager. It may change without further notice. You should not extend it from "PixelFederation\DoctrineResettableEmBundle\Tests\Unit\Helper\ProxyConnectionMock".
